追加4星模式！

推出不久的《OVERCOOKED! 2》將有新模式追加，相信大家都以完成3星評價為目標，亦有玩家已經完成所有隱藏關卡，遊戲廠商宣佈將會追加「NEW GAME+」模式，讓遊戲全45關卡的評價增至4星評價之外，已獲所有最高評價的玩家，再進行遊戲時還會有新要素，不過詳細不明，究竟這個更新將會何時推出？至今未有發表。但是如果你手上仍然有《OVERCOOKED! 2》，就要把它留起，準備下一次的「怒燒廚房」。

https://hobbigame.com/overcooked2-4/

Hello chefs

We hope you've enjoyed your time in the kitchen so far, and we want to thank you for continuously providing feedback so we can make Overcooked! 2 the best it can be!


Today we are excited to serve up a small but much requested update to your kitchens. You can now rebind your keys in the Steam version of the game. You can now chop, bake, and move with your own custom controls!

To rebind your controls:
On the Main Menu select Settings
Select Controls
Select if you are player 1 or have split keyboard for 2 players.
Then change your controls to what you want. (Some keys will not be available.)
